meta.title: Wuthering Waves Utilities
meta.description: Track pity, todo list, database, analysis and more for Wuthering Waves!

timeline.title: Timeline
timeline.description: Wuthering Waves event timeline calendar, view when an event order will start and end with neat timeline.

echos.title: Echos
echos.description: {name} is a {rarity} Class Echo. in Wuthering Waves.

id.description: {name} is a playable {attribute} Congenital Resonator in Wuthering Waves.

characters.description: Resonators are obtainable units in Wuthering Waves. Individuals with the ability to resonate with certain objects and manipulate their frequencies are known as Resonators.

id.description: {name} is a {type} weapon in Wuthering Waves that can be obtained via the game's Convene system.

weapons.title: Weapons
weapons.description: There are five types of weapons in Wuthering Waves, they are Sword, Broadblade, Gauntlet, Pistols and Rectifier.

codes.title: Wuthering Waves Gift codes for {time}
codes.description: All codes that you can redeem in Wuthering Waves for free rewards.

history.description: Convene Counter to track your pity counter and track when you get the character or weapon. You can also automatically import the logs and backup it from PC, Android, iOS, PlayStation then save it more than 6 months.

todoList.description: Wuthering Waves Todo List to plan and track items and mora you need, you can also see resin approximation needed to farm the items!

tierList.description: Find your best Wuthering Waves Tier list here or create your own tier list. Learn about all latest version Wuthering Waves Tier list.

trophies.title: Trophies
trophies.description: Track your Wuthering Waves trophies easily! Complete list of all trophies and their details.

map.description: Wuthering Waves is an open-world game. Our new interactive map is now live, allowing you to track your progress and achieve 100% exploration!

items.title: Item List
items.description: List of all items in Wuthering Waves, along with their descriptions and rarity.

import.title: Import Convenes
import.info: Your data will be saved, just enter it once next time it will be automatic Re-fill previously retrieved data. If you are logged in, the data will also be available synchronized between logged in devices.

convene.title: Convene Showcase
convene.emptyCard: Please import convene history to fill the card.

faqs.title: Where is my data being stored when I import?
faqs.content:
Your URL is only saved to your web browser. Clearing your browser data on this website will delete your stored data. If you want to check your history, you'll need to import it again.

You also have to option to safely backup your URL using your Google Account inside the Settings page.

faqs.title: How do I know this website won't steal my data?
faqs.content: Rest assured, we are players just like you and want to help Wuthering Waves grow by building useful tools for the all the Rovers in the world.

faqs.title: My history is not automatically updating, what's wrong?
faqs.content: Just like in-game, your history does not instantly update. Try checking again later to see if your history is updated, otherwise it could be a bug.

faqs.title: How do I raise a bug report or suggest a feature?
faqs.content: You can create an issue in our GitHub repository using the proper template so that we can address your concern as soon as possible. Your contribution will help us create a better experience for our users, so we would greatly appreciate it!

faqs.title: How can I support this website?
faqs.content: Thank you for using this website. As you continue to use it, you also inspire us to keep improving it. Don't forget to leave a star on Github! If you want to support us financially, we have a Donation page to accept any donations to keep the website running!

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.autoImportConveneHistorySubtitle: Once you set it up, your statistics will automatically refresh.
accounts.empty: To add an account, you just need to import convene history.
